header.title: Welcome to MyProj based on v2

section.title: Congratulations
section.p: You have successfully generated and rendered an Apache Forrest site based on v2 - dispatcher. This page is from the blank site template. It is found in src/documentation/content/xdocs/index.xml Please edit it and replace this text with content of your own.
section.fixme: The <fixme> element is used for stuff which still needs work. Mind the author attribute!
section.note: Use the <note> element to draw attention to something, e.g. ...The <code> element is used when the author can't express himself clearly using normal sentences ;-)
section.warning: Sleep deprivation can be the result of being involved in an open source project. (a.k.a. the <warning> element).
section.note: If you want your own labels for notes and warnings, specify them using the label attribute.
